CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
OldVersion.description: Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
CurrentVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
OldVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
OldVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New workload for Copilot in Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, customers will start seeing a new Copilot location within the Content Explorer. This will have all the sensitive information which is present in Copilot conversations

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New workload for Copilot in Content Explorer
OldVersion.description: With this change, customers will start seeing a new Copilot location within the Content Explorer. This will have all the sensitive information which is present in Copilot conversations

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native controls on console for OEM camera features
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams Rooms on Windows meeting rooms, you can now directly control camera features provided by OEMs. Controllable features include group framing, active speaker framing, and OEM specific IntelliFrame views composed on the in-room devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native controls on console for OEM camera features
OldVersion.description: In Teams Rooms on Windows meeting rooms, you can now directly control camera features provided by OEMs. Controllable features include group framing, active speaker framing, and OEM specific IntelliFrame views composed on the in-room devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Image generation in Copilot chat
CurrentVersion.description: Create images using natural language to visualize concepts and ideas within the flow of work in Copilot for Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Image generation in Copilot chat
OldVersion.description: Create images using natural language to visualize concepts and ideas within the flow of work in Copilot for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP) auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP) auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Setup wizard UX improvements for Workday integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Workday setup wizard will be modular and more intuitive going forward.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive web in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot agents in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users can create a Copilot agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these Copilot agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar in the inbox (CITI) card for shared calendar meeting invites
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the CITI card in the top drawer in meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.
